Comments_List: The course teaches you a lot about handling resources and air pollution, whether markets are efficient or not. It gives you tools to increase efficiency in using the environmental resources.
If the class size were smaller, there could have been great discussions on different topics.
Yes, if anyone is intetested in getting to know about environmental economics, this is a great first course that gives out a lot of information.
